metadata.description: This document is the official program of the Ceremonies at the Inaugural Platform on July 4, 1946 at Luneta, Manila. It contains the proclamation and inauguration of the Republic of the Philippines, induction into office of the President and Vice-Pres of the Republic of the Philippines. The program starts at 6:30 AM and ends at 12:00 NN.
metadata.subject: program
metadata.title: Program Of The Ceremonies Attending The Proclamation And Inauguration Of The Republic of the Philippines
metadata.subject: inauguration
Republic Day
